name: timednighttheme
title: TimedNightTheme
description: Enable night mode of the Firefox Dev theme on a schedule.
author: Marcelo Gheiler (Sorgrum)

preferences.name: extension.stylish.toggled
preferences.title: Stylish Support
preferences.description: Enable or disable all Stylish styles depending on whether it is day or night

preferences.name: day
preferences.title: Day Time
preferences.description: When it is past this hour light mode activates (24 Hour)

preferences.name: night
preferences.title: Night Time
preferences.description: When it is past this hour night mode activates (24 Hour)
